entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
